title: Piet Mondrian Journals—Pair
description:
Journals developed from Piet Mondrian's Lozenge Composition with Yellow, Black, Blue, Red, and Gray, 1921 and Study for a Composition, 1940-41, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Perfect for keeping a diary, notes, and musing.  Each journal features one of the artworks by Mondrian.

  • 2 Journals.
  • Dimensions: 7 x 5 in.
  • 64 pages – lined.
  • Printed paper with machine sewn binding.
